content: sleeve on a holder back yoke sr and side yoke sr charts in order sm co17 using loop cast-on work right-side r4 of front york sr from r to l turn work r1 of right body chart sts 52-59 sr4-18 continue as for sr2 3 following the charts > 282 sts total sr19 rs work left-side r19 of front york sr from r to l r2-50 sm work the next row following center body r - l work r19 from r to l following side yoke sr left body center body r - l right body charts in order back yoke sr and side yoke sr charts in order end german short row 4 / 5 sec 3 front hem r1 join yarn at the center of the underarm pick up and knit 10 sts from the underarm work front hem flat place 76 sleeve sts on the left-hand needle and start chart front hem see chart page 11 work r1 of sleeve r - l chart sts 11-86 pick up and knit 9 sts from the underarm r1 rs rm work r1 of front hem r - l chart sts 6-142 pm for bor join to work in the round place 142 sts for back hem on a holder turn > 95 sts total > 142 sts total r2-50 work the next row of sleeve r - l r2-18 work the next row of front hem r - l turn > 77 sts total > 110 sts total bobble all stitches in front hem r - l pattern sec 6 cuffs sec 4 back hem work cuff in the round start chart cuff see chart page 16 use 4 5mm/jp8 circular needle work back hem flat r1-46 work r1-46 of cuff start chart back hem see chart page 12-13 > 53 sts total bobble all stitches in cuff pattern r1 rs join yarn at the left side of body work r1 of back hem r - l turn sec 7 neck r2-26 work the next row of back hem r - l turn > 94 sts total use 4 2mm/jp7 circular needle bobble all stitches in back hem r - l pattern work neck in the round sec 5 sleeves remove the crocheted provisional cast on from sec 1 and place the 108 sts on the needle join to work in the round use 4 5mm/jp8 circular needle slip stitches until the center of the back pm for bor join yarn work sleeve in the round start chart sleeve see chart page 14-15 r1-2 sm k to m r3-15 sm k1 tbl p1 to m bobble all stitches knitwise fold the neck in half to the wrong side and sew in place 5 / 5 chart legend ｜ rs k ｜ ws p ／_ rs p2to ／_ ws k2to ／／ 2/2 rt 表目 裏目 裏目の左上2目一度 左上2目一度 左上2目交差 rs p ws k _＼ rs ssp _＼ ws ssk ＼＼ rs 2/2 lt ＼＼ ws 2/2 lt w 裏目 表目 裏目の右上2目一度
